statements: SELECT * FROM CrimeData
SELECT id, crime_type, location FROM CrimeData
SELECT location, crime_type, id FROM CrimeData
SELECT * FROM CrimeData WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery'
SELECT id, location, date_time FROM CrimeData ORDER BY date_time DESC
SELECT * FROM CrimeData ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT crime_type, location FROM CrimeData WHERE id > 100
SELECT id, crime_type FROM CrimeData WHERE location LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT * FROM CrimeData WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery' ORDER BY date_time ASC
SELECT id, incident_description FROM CrimeData WHERE crime_type = 'Assault'
SELECT * FROM crime_data;
SELECT crime_type, crime_date, location FROM crime_data;
SELECT id, crime_type, crime_date, location FROM crime_data WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT * FROM policy_decisions;
SELECT decision_title, department, decision_date FROM policy_decisions;
SELECT * FROM crime_data WHERE crime_type = 'Theft'
SELECT crime_type, location FROM crime_data WHERE crime_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY crime_date DESC
SELECT * FROM policy_decisions WHERE department = 'Police Department'
SELECT decision_title, decision_date FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT crime_type, location, suspect_id FROM crime_data WHERE location LIKE '%street%'
SELECT * FROM crime_reports;
SELECT report_date, crime_type, location FROM crime_reports WHERE crime_type = 'Theft';
SELECT report_id, report_date, location FROM crime_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM crime_reports WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT * FROM law_enforcement_agencies ORDER BY officer_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM crime_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, crime_type ASC
SELECT report_id, crime_type, location FROM crime_reports WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' AND location LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT * FROM law_enforcement_agencies WHERE officer_count > 50 ORDER BY agency_name ASC
SELECT decision_id, decision_date FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_maker = 'Mayor'
SELECT decision_maker, decision_description FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM crime_data;
SELECT criminal_name, criminal_age FROM criminal_records WHERE criminal_gender='M';
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_date FROM crime_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT crime_type, crime_location FROM crime_data WHERE crime_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM law_enforcement WHERE agency_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM crime_data WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT criminal_name, criminal_age FROM criminal_records WHERE criminal_gender = 'M' ORDER BY criminal_age DESC;
SELECT crime_location, crime_date FROM crime_data WHERE crime_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY crime_date ASC;
SELECT c.criminal_name, l.agency_name FROM criminal_records c JOIN law_enforcement l ON c.crime_id = l.agency_id ORDER BY c.criminal_name ASC, l.agency_name DESC;

SELECT a.analysis_type, c.crime_type, l.agency_location FROM crime_analysis a JOIN crime_data c ON a.crime_id = c.crime_id JOIN law_enforcement l ON a.agency_id = l.agency_id WHERE a.analysis_type LIKE '%Forensic%' ORDER BY a.analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Crimes;
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, crime_location FROM Crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT crime_date, crime_location, perpetrator_id FROM Crimes ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT perpetrator_name, perpetrator_age, perpetrator_gender, perpetrator_address FROM Perpetrators WHERE perpetrator_age > 30;
SELECT victim_name, victim_age, victim_gender, victim_address FROM Victims WHERE victim_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT crime_type, crime_location, crime_date FROM Crimes WHERE crime_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT c.crime_type, p.perpetrator_name FROM Crimes c JOIN Perpetrators p ON c.perpetrator_id = p.perpetrator_id WHERE p.perpetrator_gender = 'Male';
SELECT v.victim_name, c.crime_type, l.agency_name FROM Victims v JOIN Crimes c ON v.crime_id = c.crime_id JOIN LawEnforcement l ON c.crime_location = l.jurisdiction;

SELECT r.report_date, c.crime_type, p.perpetrator_name, l.agency_name FROM CrimeReports r JOIN Crimes c ON r.crime_id = c.crime_id JOIN Perpetrators p ON r.perpetrator_id = p.perpetrator_id JOIN LawEnforcement l ON r.officer_id = l.agency_id WHERE p.perpetrator_age >= 18 ORDER BY r.report_date ASC;
